imgDesc.text: Gray Crystals are crystals left behind by the remnants of corruption. Use the power of <color=#ffe14b>Khvarena</color> to <color=#ffe14b>clear them out</color> . But once said power retreats, the Gray Crystals will reemerge...

Gray Crystals are crystals left behind by the remnants of corruption. Use the power of <color=#ffe14b>Khvarena</color> to <color=#ffe14b>clear them out</color> . But once said power retreats, the Gray Crystals will reemerge...
